name: HoverThis
description:
In loving memory of Flappy Bird, we created HoverThis.

HoverThis is a game as much as an open letter to Flappy Bird's creator with lots of love and respect. We have taken the existing formula and pushing it further beyond. (Be sure to check out the in-game message box for what we’re trying to say)

GAME  TRAILER:
HoverThis - Official Game Trailer (HD)

FEATURES:

-  Offering 2 game modes:  Basic and Challenge
-  Practice with Basic Mode or go for progressively difficult gameplay at Challenge Mode
-  Collect Flappies to unlock new Flappers and Obstacles!
-  Customize your game for different look and feel. More Flappers and Obstacles will be added regularly!


HOW  TO  PLAY:
- Tap the screen to keep the Box in the air!
- Avoid barriers on the screen!
- Stay alive for as long as you can!


DOWNLOAD:
FREE! Download at Google Play
(Coming Soon to Apple App Store in March 2014)
